 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָדַר‎</span> **verb** ==be dark== (***dull-coloured***, compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be dirty*** (on <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ד‎</span> see [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG xl (1886), 729</sup>); Late Hebrew Hiph\`il (of face) ***shew gloom***; <lookup onclick="bdbabb('Tg')"><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ᵑ7‎</span><sup>**J**</sup></lookup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קְדַר‎</span> ***be dark***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְקָדַר‎</span> [[Mic.3.6|Mic 3:6]] 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָדַרְתִּי‎</span> [[Jer.8.21|Jer 8:21]], etc.; ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֹדֵר‎</span> [[Ps.35.14|Ps 35:14]] +; plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֹדְרִים‎</span> [[Job.5.11|Job 5:11]]; [[Job.6.16|Job 6:16]] — ***be dark***, of sky [[Jer.4.28|Jer 4:28]] (leaden-coloured, as with clouds, see Hithpa\`el), of sun and moon [[Joel.2.10|Joel 2:10]]; [[Joel.4.15|Joel 4:15]] figurative of lack of revelation from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲלֵיהֶם הַיּוֺם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְק‎</span> [[Mic.3.6|Mic 3:6]] of turbid stream [[Job.6.16|Job 6:16]] figurative of mourning (probably ***be squalid***, of neglected person and dress of mourner, compare [[2Sam.19.25|2Sam 19:25]]) [[Jer.8.21|Jer 8:21]]; [[Jer.14.2|Jer 14:2]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָאָרֶץ‎</span>, metaphor of gates); [[Job.5.11|Job 5:11]]; [[Job.30.28|Job 30:28]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּלֹא חַמָּה‎</span>), [[Ps.35.14|Ps 35:14]]; [[Ps.38.7|Ps 38:7]]; [[Ps.42.10|Ps 42:10]]; [[Ps.43.2|Ps 43:2]]. 

**Hiph\`il 1.** ***darken: Perfect*** 1 singular consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִקְדַּרְתִּי‎</span> [[Ezek.32.7|Ezek 32:7]] (object stars), compare ***Imperfect*** 1 singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַקְדִּירֵם עָלֶיךָ‎</span> [[Ezek.32.8|Ezek 32:8]]. 

**2.** ***cause to mourn*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וָאַקְדִּר עָלָיו לְבָנוֺן‎</span> [[Ezek.31.15|Ezek 31:15]]. **Hithpa\`el** ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהַשָּׁמַיִם הִתְקַדְּרוּ עָבִים‎</span> [[1Kgs.18.45|1Kgs 18:45]] ***and the heavens grew dark with clouds.***
